thread.title: Man in North West court for killing, raping girl, 7
thread.title_full: Man in North West court for killing, raping girl, 7 | News24

author: news24.com
title: Man in North West court for killing, raping girl, 7
text:
Johannesburg - A man accused of raping and murdering a 7-year-old girl later found hanging from a tree has appeared in the Madikwe Magistrate's Court, North West police said on Wednesday.
David Mahlangu, 27, was arrested on Sunday around 11:00 in the Madikwe area after the girl went missing from her home on the same day, spokesperson Colonel Sabata Mokgwabone said in a statement.
"The community was allegedly searching for her when they saw the suspect coming back from the bushes. According to the information available at this stage, some community members held the man while others proceeded to the direction where he came from."
Upon searching, community members allegedly found the girl's body hanging on a tree.
